items.content_html: React TypeScript Slider is a lightweight and customizable slideshow component built with React and TypeScript. This project allows users to create dynamic slideshows with images, text, and buttons, perfect for showcasing products, portfolios, or featured content on websites.

This project allows users to create dynamic slideshows with images, text, and buttons, perfect for showcasing products, portfolios, or featured content on websites.
